title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in dynamic text items and data/text items is different.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
 1. Retrieve datetime values from a table. 
 2. Display the values in both a dynamic text item and a data/text item. 
 3. Observe that the format of the datetime values is different in each item.
